author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA MEANDERING IN THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...MELISSA MEANDERING IN THE CENTRAL CARIBBEAN... ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING EXPECTED OVER PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... As of 5:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.4, -74.3 with movement WNW at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
